Comment: loop index variable "index" should be a single letter [as specified in Code Review Comments](https://github.com/codelingo/codelingo/blob/master/tenets/codelingo/code-review-comments/FULL_TEXT.md#variable-names)
Snippet:
sum = 0
	for index := 0; index < 10; index++ { //ISSUE
		sum += index
	}

Comment: loop index variable "index" should be a single letter [as specified in Code Review Comments](https://github.com/codelingo/codelingo/blob/master/tenets/codelingo/code-review-comments/FULL_TEXT.md#variable-names)
